DOC.brief_title: Study Assess Immunogenicity Safety Etanercept Produced Using Modified Process Patients With Plaque Psoriasis
DOC.detailed_description: This multicenter , open-label , single-arm phase 4 study patient plaque psoriasis etanercept-naïve receiving methotrexate therapy . The study consist screen period 30 day , 24-week treatment period 30-day follow-up period safety . Etanercept dose follow recommend label dose patient plaque psoriasis .
